content.svp: Enable multiple industries to run charging networks to drive the transition to electric mobility
content.parent_description: The charge point operator involves installation and operation of charging equipment for electric vehicles.
description: Operate multi-industry, sustainable, and intelligent new business models at the intersection of mobility and the energy sector.
Provide cloud-based, comprehensive functionality including operations and management of charging infrastructure, payments, billing, and smart-energy management.

Deliver bidirectional communication with vendor-independent charging infrastructures to support authorization management, charging process management, status and error messages, consumption measurement, firmware management, and much more through the Open Charge Point Protocol (OCPP) standard.
Monitor charging infrastructure status including fault prediction and root-cause analysis based on situational data.

Request data from suppliers.
Publish your own product carbon footprints to buyers.
Feed supplier information into the product carbon footprint calculation in SAP Sustainability Footprint Management.

Use decentralized identity management wallets for corporate verifiable credentials.
